sec.p:
Orbital tuning, bandpass-filtering, calculation of sedimentation rates, and Blackman–Tukey cross-spectral analyses are performed with AnalySeries 2.0.4.2
73 . Cross-wavelet analysis is performed following ref.
74 . We utilize wavelet coherence to quantify coherence and phase relationships between the benthic δ 13C and δ 18O time series in frequency space. We employed the Morlet wavelet and a Monte Carlo count of 300 to establish the statistical significance level (5%). Prior to analysis, both time series were interpolated to 2 kyr time steps and standardized (zero mean and unit standard deviation). Software is available at http://www.pol.ac.uk/home/research/waveletcoherence/.
